messages.speaker: system
messages.text: Hello! How can I assist you today?

messages.speaker: user
messages.text: which is the best route to guayaquil from Quito

messages.speaker: system
messages.text: The most common and fastest route to Guayaquil from Quito is via E40 and Highway 35, also known as Pan-American Highway:1. Get on Autopista Rumiñahui from Av. Gran Colombia and Av. 10 de Agosto.2. Continue on Autopista General Rumiñahui. Take E35 and Troncal de la Sierra/E40 to Guayaquil.This route will take approximately 6 to 8 hours, depending on traffic and speed, as the distance is about 420 km. I would recommend checking the current traffic situation before you leave.

messages.speaker: system
messages.text: You're welcome! If you have any other questions, feel free to ask.
